metadata.title: Vue
metadata.intro: A Vue 3 cheat sheet with the most important concepts, reactivity, component system, routing, and more. Updated for the latest version and perfect for both beginners and advanced users.

cards.title: 📘 Vue.js 3 Cheatsheet – Beginner to Advanced
cards.body: > The ultimate reference for mastering Vue 3.

cards.title: CDN (Quick Start)
Vite + Vue
cards.body:
```bash
npm create vite@latest my-vue-app --template vue
cd my-vue-app
npm install
npm run dev
```

cards.title: 🧼 16. Best Practices
cards.body:
* Use `ref()` for primitives, `reactive()` for objects
* Use `<script setup>` syntax in SFCs
* Break UI into small, reusable components
* Always define `key` in `v-for`
* Use slots for flexible composition
